Swordsmiths of the Gendaito Period - Book index of over 1500 swordsmiths,
with Glossary and Oshigatas & comments by Fred,

Fred has directed the Japanese Society of Canada for many years, he can be
contacted directly at: cansamurai@...  

Fred also has published Swordsmiths of the Bizen Province, which I just
happen to be using as a reference tonight.

Rick

             Quick question about a book. Has anyone heard of "Swords and
Swordsmiths of the Genda - period 1868-1989"????????????????
Author; Fred Fimio

Any input on this would be greatly appreciated. Any suggestions on books I
should be looking into?  Have a great weekend everyone

Kind regards,  Mark
